page.shortlink: api client api a5 viewbox populate method

argument.name: keepValue
argument.description: Whether or not to keep the previous value of the view box, or reset it.

argument.name: animation
argument.description: What animation to perform. To not animate pass in false. See *[link:A5.ViewBox.refresh]*.

argument.name: fireEvent
argument.description: Whether or not to fire the populate events.

page.description: Populate the view box with new data.
